name: Unreal Vicinity
description:
After an accident you wake up in an unknown world...what happened with you and where are you?

Unreal Vicinity is a game about the tragic story of the main character, who is than trapped in an unreal world. The objective is to get out there. For that the player has to solve different puzzles, while thinking about the background of his presence.

I made this game for the "Brackeys Game Jam 2022". The topic was "It is not real".

NOTE THAT THE MOVEMENT IN THE DOWNLOADEABLE VERSION IS MUCH SMOOTHER AND NOT AS LAGGY, WHICH IS WHY I WOULD SUGGEST USING THAT VERSION.

I hope you enjoy playing the game and give me a bit of feedback, about what you liked and what I could improve.

keep it up ;)
